title: UX designer
description: I worked with about 10 other students on a project we called Vipps Donate. The goal was to create a new way for people to donate money to charities. We used Figma to create a prototype and then tested it with real users.

title: UX designer
description: Through our bachelor's thesis we worked with Shortcut on a project to create an Android app for one of their existing customers. We ended up using Jetpack Compose while it was in it's beta phase, and focused on the performance and accessibility compared to the old framework.

title: Student assistant
description: I helped students with their projects and assignments in courses relating to web development, creative web projects and database programming.

title: Developer and UX designer
description: The majority of my work was focused on making reusable components for different Wordpress sites. I also worked on the design of the sites.
